about.title: About Me
about.section1: I'm a full-stack software developer and Systems Analysis and Development student at the University of Passo Fundo (UPF), based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. I build dynamic web applications, back-end systems, and productivity tools such as CLIs and automations.
about.section2: I'm adaptable and committed to staying up-to-date with industry trends while grounded in traditional and reliable technologies. Feel free to explore my work and reach out — I'm always open to opportunities to learn and collaborate!

I help build and maintain highly interactive web applications for more than 100 real estate companies, focusing on accessibility, performance, and organic visibility. I led the development of a key operational system that centralizes data and automates workflows, and I also developed the company's new institutional website. I collaborate on planning, code reviews, and documentation to ensure smooth development and high-quality deliveries.

I build modern web applications in the Vue and TypeScript ecosystems, prioritizing performance, responsiveness, and usability. I use Tailwind CSS to create consistent interfaces efficiently. I also develop back-end systems in Node.js, such as REST APIs, authentication flows, and database integrations, while setting up production environments and monitoring.
